item.title: Ship: Precursor
item.description: Ship: Precursor Lead by the scientist [Mark Dubois](/characters/Mark_Dubois.md), the Precursor is under the flag of the company [Arstir Industries](/faction/Arstir_industries.md). Background The ship left earth 2154 to get more detailed informations if life is really possible on the planet [Vetoo 581d](/planets/vetoo_581d.md). The science crew assigned to it managed to...
